dataModelMapping.javascript: function(context, parameter) { return AbstractSelection.selection(new DataModelMapping(parameter, {defaultMappings: false}).configure(function(fields){fields.map('SELSCR-DATE#1').toStart('DOC_DATE'); fields.map('SELSCR-DATE#2').toEnd('DOC_DATE'); fields.map('SELSCR-STATUS').to('GC_IV_ExternalStatus'); fields.map('SELSCR-VENDOR').to('VENDOR_NO');fields.map('SELSCR-COMP_CODE').to('COMP_CODE'); fields.map('SELSCR-DOCNO').to('DOCNO'); fields.map('SELSCR-REFDOCNO').to('REF_DOC_NO'); fields.map('SELSCR-PO_NUMBER').to('PO_NUMBER'); fields.map('SELSCR-CURRENCY').to('CURRENCY'); fields.map('SELSCR-GROSS#1').toStart('GROSS_AMOUNT'); fields.map('SELSCR-GROSS#2').toEnd('GROSS_AMOUNT'); fields.map('SELSCR-MAX_NUMBER#1').to('_MAX-HITS');}).install());}

username.javascript: function(context, parameter){var name=context.getUser().getUsername(); if (context.getUser().getUserRole() == 'SuperAdmin' || context.getUser().getUserRole() == 'Admin' || context.getUser().getUserRole() == 'SupplierAdmin' || context.getUser().getUserRole() == 'Ordinary') {return AbstractValue.wildcard();}else{return AbstractValue.value(name);}}
